LanguageData.IntakeFan.label: Intake Air Fan
LanguageData.IntakeFan.description: This device takes air from its environment like a room or outside. It channels this air to a Pipe network.
LanguageData.IntakeFan_Blueprint.label: Intake Air Fan (Blueprint)
LanguageData.IntakeFan_Frame.label: Intake Air Fan (Building)
LanguageData.IntakeFan_Frame.description: Channels air from its surrondings to a Pipe Network.
LanguageData.AirThermal.label: Air Climate Control
LanguageData.AirThermal.description: This device takes air from a Pipe Network and cools or heats it depending on the Target temperature.
LanguageData.AirThermal_Blueprint.label: Air Climate Control (Blueprint)
LanguageData.AirThermal_Frame.label: Air Climate Control (Building)
LanguageData.AirThermal_Frame.description: Converts air in a Pipe Network to its target temperature.
LanguageData.AirVent.label: Air Exhaust Vent
LanguageData.AirVent.description: This device takes air from a Pipe Network and dumps it in the connected room or outside environment.
LanguageData.AirVent_Blueprint.label: Air Exhaust Vent (Blueprint)
LanguageData.AirVent_Frame.label: Air Exhaust Vent (Building)
LanguageData.AirVent_Frame.description: Exhausts the air in a Pipe Network.

LanguageData.LargeIntakeFan_Frame.label: Large Intake Fan (Building)
LanguageData.LargeIntakeFan_Frame.description: Channels air from its surrondings to a Pipe Network.
LanguageData.LargeAirThermal.label: Large Air Climate Control
LanguageData.LargeAirThermal.description: This device takes air from a Pipe Network and cools or heats it depending on the Target temperature.
LanguageData.LargeAirThermal_Blueprint.label: Large Air Climate Control (Blueprint)
LanguageData.LargeAirThermal_Frame.label: Large Air Climate Control (Building)
LanguageData.LargeAirThermal_Frame.description: Converts air in a Pipe Network to its target temperature.
LanguageData.WallAirVent.label: Wall Mounted Air Vent
LanguageData.WallAirVent.description: This device takes air from a Pipe Network and dumps it in the connected room or outside environment.
LanguageData.WallAirVent_Blueprint.label: Wall Mounted Air Vent (Blueprint)
LanguageData.WallAirVent_Frame.label: Wall Mounted Air Vent (Building)
LanguageData.WallAirVent_Frame.description: Exhausts the air in a Pipe Network.
LanguageData.WallAirVentSmall.label: Small Wall Mounted Air Vent
LanguageData.WallAirVentSmall.description: This device takes air from a Pipe Network and dumps it in the connected room or outside environment.
LanguageData.WallAirVentSmall_Blueprint.label: Small Wall Mounted Air Vent (Blueprint)
LanguageData.WallAirVentSmall_Frame.label: Small Wall Mounted Air Vent (Building)
LanguageData.WallAirVentSmall_Frame.description: Exhausts the air in a Pipe Network.
LanguageData.SurroundAirVent.label: Surround Air Vent
LanguageData.SurroundAirVent.description: This device takes air from a Pipe Network and dumps it in the connected room or outside environment.
LanguageData.SurroundAirVent_Blueprint.label: Surround Air Vent (Blueprint)
LanguageData.SurroundAirVent_Frame.label: Surround Air Vent (Building)
LanguageData.SurroundAirVent_Frame.description: Exhausts the air in all directions in a room from a Pipe Network.
